name: modperl-cvs
unsub: To unsubscribe send an emptyemail to mailto: modperl-cvs-unsubscribe@perl.apache.org
summary: The modperl developers list is the list where you can watch mod_perl getting patched. No real discussions happen on this list, but if you want to know about the latest changes in the mod_perl core before the rest of the people, this is a list to be on.
sub: To subscribe send an empty email to mailto: modperl-cvs-subscribe@perl.apache.org
help: Send an empty email to mailto: modperl-cvs-help@perl.apache.org
